# TASK::PED_HAS_USE_SCENARIO_TASK

## Summary
Returns TRUE if the ped has the USE_SCENARIO task

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Use IS_PED_ACTIVE_IN_SCENARIO to check if the ped is not doing intro/exit
